en.name: Ballad of the Boundless Blue
en.passiveDescription: Within 6s after Normal or Charged Attacks hit an opponent, Normal Attack DMG will be increased by {{8//10//12//14//16%}} and Charged Attack DMG will be increased by {{6//7.5//9//10.5//12%}}. Max 3 stacks. This effect can be triggered once every 0.3s.

zh.name: 无垠蔚蓝之歌
zh.passiveDescription: 普通攻击或重击命中敌人后的6秒内，普通攻击造成的伤害提升{{8//10//12//14//16%}}，重击造成的伤害提升{{6//7.5//9//10.5//12%}}。该效果至多叠加3次，每0.3秒至多触发一次。
